amendment.description: To amend titles XI and XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide increased civil and criminal penalties for acts involving fraud and abuse under the Medicare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3906 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3906 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Martinez to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S1013-1020, S1026, S1040; text: CR S1014) To amend titles XI and XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide increased civil and criminal penalties for acts involving fraud and abuse under the Medicare program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3906 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3906 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Martinez to Amendment SA 3899.
